name: Facets (JZDIVA)
description:
Deep within a human testing facility, you find yourself with multiple personalities and no memory of what led to this. Each of these personalities has a unique ability. Using one ability at a time, you have been tasked with solving a seemingly endless amount of puzzles in the name of science. Will you be able to solve these puzzles or is it possible to escape?

Facets was made as a final project for a first year game development course .
